name: jUvENoiA
description:
You find yourself in a forum and see all those annoying posts about 'kids these days'. It's time to fight back with the strongest weapon we have to offer:

Memes! Recreate the classic mocking meme to troll those old sacks and save the lost generation.

Controls:

Arrow Up/Down - Select message

Type the text of the message using both upper and lower case letters ( bOtH uPpEr aNd lOwEr cASe lEtTErS ) and confirm it by pressing enter.
